template.name: Modal View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
Vote for Pi Network Games from Latin America in Pi Brainstorm.
We won an Honorable mention!!!:
Pi Hackathon Announcement
Watch the Pi Core Team tweet
* LatinChain Platform (Games from Latin America for Pi).
* Use this link to join Pi Network: https://minepi.com/rockcesar
* Use this code to join Pi Network: rockcesar
(Remember clear the Pi Browser cache if it is not working well).
Thank you very much!.

template.name: Mainnet redirect View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
                
                    

                        
                        
                        
                        LatinChain Redirect.
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready( function () {
                                $(".openMainnetModal").click(function(){
                                    $(".modal-body").html($("#open_mainnet_message").html());
                                    $("#open_modal").click();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".latinchain-ecosystem" ).click(function() {
                                    $.colorbox({href:"https://ecosystem.latin-chain.com", iframe:true, fixed: true, width: "100%", height: "100%", maxWidth: "100%", maxHeight: "100%"});
                                });
                            });
                        
                    

                    
                        
                        
You can Donate on LatinChain Mainnet and start using it everyday being verified during a month. Or access as unverified user.
Which one you choose?.
                        

                            

                                

                                    
 
test.latin-chain.com/latinchain-mainnet-redirect 
                                    
                                        Show tip
                                    
                                
                                
                                

                                    
 
test.latin-chain.com/latinchain-onlymainnet-redirect 
                                    
                                        Show tip
                                    
                                
                            
                            
                            

                                We are testing LatinChain Mainnet on Pi Network cryptocurrency ecosystem. Get double utility usage bonus  by using both Mainnet and Testnet.
                                
                            
                            
                            

                                We are testing LatinChain Mainnet on Pi Network cryptocurrency ecosystem. Get double utility usage bonus  by using both Mainnet and Testnet.
                                Close this page
                            
                            
                            

                                
                                
                                

                            
                            
                            
                            
                            

                                

                                    
Click here
(Go to LatinChain Mainnet)
                                    
                                    
                                
                            
                            

                                

                                    


PAY HERE 
(UNLOCK)

Earn Latin points () 
(Mainnet)
                                
                            
                            
                            

                                

                                    Go to LatinChain Testnet
                                
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            

                                

                                    

                                        
                                        

                                            
Understanding the LatinChain Ecosystem
                                            

                                                Your gateway to decentralized applications on the Pi Network.
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        

                                            

                                                Welcome to the LatinChain Ecosystem portal. As a decentralized application (dApp) built on the Pi Network, our goal is to provide real utility and seamless interaction for the Pi community. Whether you are a developer, a pioneer, or a casual user, understanding the difference between our Mainnet and Testnet environments is crucial for maximizing your experience.
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                            

                                                
Why Choose the Mainnet?
                                                

                                                    The LatinChain Mainnet (latinchain.pinet.com) is the live production environment where real value is exchanged. By accessing the Mainnet, you are interacting with the fully operational version of our blockchain application.
                                                
                                                
                                                    

                                                        Real Utility: Every action contributes to the genuine activity of the network.
                                                    
                                                    

                                                        Verified Status: Users who choose to support the ecosystem via donations can unlock "Verified" status. This signals your commitment to the community.
                                                    
                                                    

                                                        Double Utility Bonus: Active usage on the Mainnet contributes to your Pi utility usage bonus.
                                                    
                                                
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                            
The Role of the Testnet
                                            

                                                The Testnet serves as our sandbox environment. It is designed for users who want to explore new features, test transaction flows, or understand the mechanics of the LatinChain token without using real Pi. It is the perfect training ground for new pioneers to get comfortable with Web3 interactions before moving to the Mainnet.
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                            
How the LatinChain Token Works
                                            

                                                LatinChain is designed to foster a digital economy within the Pi Browser. By participating in either network, you are helping to stress-test and improve a growing financial ecosystem.
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                            
Select an option above to begin your journey.
                                        

                                    
                                
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            
							
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                        
                        





                        
                        
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            var tooltipTriggerList = [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('[data-bs-toggle="tooltip"]'))
                            var tooltipList = tooltipTriggerList.map(function (tooltipTriggerEl) {
                                return new bootstrap.Tooltip(tooltipTriggerEl)
                            })

template.name: Reading club View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
                
                    

                        
                        
                        
                        Reading Club
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            $( document ).ready(function() {
                                $("html").attr("lang", "en"); 
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                            $( document ).ready(function() { 
                                
                                var e_keyup = jQuery.Event("keyup");
                                e_keyup.which = 13; // 13 is the key code for 'Enter'
                                e_keyup.keyCode = 13; // Setting both for cross-browser safety
                            
                                $( ".search-collectibles" ).keyup(function() {
                                    var search_collectibles_val = $( ".search-collectibles" ).val().trim();

                                    if(search_collectibles_val == "")
                                    {
                                        $(".product").show();
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                        if($('input[name="show-section"]:checked').val() == "show-spring-clothing")
                                            $(".product").show();
                                        else
                                        {
                                            $(".product").hide();
                                            $(".product").each(function() {
                                                // 'this' refers to the current DOM element in the loop
                                                // You can wrap 'this' in $() to use jQuery methods on it

                                                if($(this).text().trim().toLowerCase().includes(search_collectibles_val.toLowerCase()))
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show(); // Example: hide each element
                                                }else
                                                {
                                                    $(this).hide();
                                                }
                                                //console.log($(this).text()); // Example: log the text content of each element
                                            });
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                                
                                $('input[name="show-section"]').change(function() {
                                    var selectedValue = $(this).val();
                                    
                                    if(selectedValue == "show-all")
                                    {
                                        $(".spring-clothing").show();
                                        $(".amazon-best-deals").show();
                                        $(".udemy-courses").show();
                                        $(".amazon-books").show();
                                        $(".search-section").show();
                                    }else if(selectedValue == "show-spring-clothing")
                                    {
                                        $(".spring-clothing").show();
                                        $(".amazon-best-deals").hide();
                                        $(".udemy-courses").hide();
                                        $(".amazon-books").hide();
                                        $(".search-section").hide();
                                    }else if(selectedValue == "show-amazon-best-deals")
                                    {
                                        $(".spring-clothing").hide();
                                        $(".amazon-best-deals").show();
                                        $(".udemy-courses").hide();
                                        $(".amazon-books").hide();
                                        $(".search-section").show();
                                    }else if(selectedValue == "show-udemy-courses")
                                    {
                                        $(".spring-clothing").hide();
                                        $(".amazon-best-deals").hide();
                                        $(".udemy-courses").show();
                                        $(".amazon-books").hide();
                                        $(".search-section").show();
                                    }else if(selectedValue == "show-amazon-books")
                                    {
                                        $(".spring-clothing").hide();
                                        $(".amazon-best-deals").hide();
                                        $(".udemy-courses").hide();
                                        $(".amazon-books").show();
                                        $(".search-section").show();
                                    }
                                    
                                    $(".search-collectibles").trigger(e_keyup);
                                });
                                
                                $('input[name="show-section"][value="show-all"]').prop('checked', true);
                                $(".search-collectibles").val("");
                                $(".search-collectibles").trigger(e_keyup);
                                
                                var btn = $('.button-share');
                                
                                // Must be triggered some kind of "user activation"
                                if(btn)
                                {
                                    btn.click(async () => {
                                        const shareData = {
                                            title: 'LatinChain Shopping Club',
                                            text: $("#share-message-1").text() + "\n\nClub:\nhttps://club.latin-chain.com/\nBlockchain dApps:\nhttps://latinchain.pinet.com/",
                                            //url: 'https://latin-chain.com/',
                                        }
                                        
                                        if (!navigator.share) {
                                            Pi.openShareDialog(shareData.title, shareData.text);
                                        }else
                                        {
                                          try {
                                            await navigator.share(shareData);
                                            //resultPara.textContent = 'MDN shared successfully'
                                          } catch(err) {
                                            //alert('Error: ' + err);
                                          }
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                                
                                const STORAGE_KEY_MAINSCREEN = 'speech_synthesis_active';
                                
                                if (localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY_MAINSCREEN) !== 'true'){ // || !('speechSynthesis' in window)) {
                                    $('#pi_automatic_accessibility').prop('checked', false);
                                    speechModule.deactivate();
                                }else
                                {
                                    $('#pi_automatic_accessibility').prop('checked', true);
                                    speechModule.deactivate();
                                    speechModule.activate();
                                    //speechModule.activate();
                                }
                                
                                $('#pi_automatic_accessibility').change(function() {
                                    var pi_automatic_accessibility = $("#pi_automatic_accessibility").is(":checked");
                                    
                                    alert(pi_automatic_accessibility);
                                    
                                    if(pi_automatic_accessibility)
                                    {
                                        speechModule.activate();
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                        speechModule.deactivate();
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        

                            

                            
Welcome to Your LatinChain Club
                            
Welcome to Your LatinChain Shopping Club 

                            

                            

                                

                                    

#Accessibility 📰
                                
                                

                                  
                                  
                                    

                                        Activate accessibility.
                                    
                                  
                                
                            
                            

                            
Visit our Blockchain dApp:

                            https://latinchain.pinet.com/
                            
From Venezuela you can use mailboxes to import from the USA (find your own in your country): Zoom, Telocomproenusa, etc.
                            
Udemy courses, Amazon Books.
                            
Buying point: Spring clothing, Amazon best sellers and deals, Udemy courses, Amazon Books. Shipping worldwide.
                            

                            

                                

                                    

                                      
                                      
                                        
Show all sections

template.name: LatinChain token whitepaper View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
LatinChain Token Whitepaper
LatinChain Token info
LatinChain Token foundations (This token isn't launched yet on Mainnet)
LatinChain Token is based on the LatinChain Platform project (online since 2021).
Mainnet:
https://latinchain.pinet.com
Testnet:
https://latinchaintest9869.pinet.com
Max Supply
100,000,000 LatinChain
100,000,000,000 Pi (Pi Network)
Reserved for Pi Liquidity Pool Supply
10,000,000 LatinChain
Reserved for Other Exchanges
10,000,000 LatinChain
Reserved for Developers and LatinChain related
20,000,000 LatinChain
Reserved for LatinChain future and current projects, and LatinChain reserve
60,000,000 LatinChain
